author: fabien
msg: French translation update.
* subversion/po/fr.po: po-update + fixes.

author: malcolm
msg: Further followups to r22727.
Take advantage of the fact that a stream can now own a file handle,
allowing us to remove an explicit close of the new text base file, and,
more importantly, to ensure that the file is always closed before we
attempt to remove it (in the error case).
Also add a comment and remove two redundant error checks.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_crawler.c
(svn_wc_transmit_text_deltas2): Use non-deprecated
svn_stream_from_aprfile2() so that the stream owns the new text base
file.  Remove two redundant checks of 'err'.

author: cmpilato
msg: Merged revisions 22346,22351-22352 via svnmerge from
http://svn.collab.net/repos/svn/trunk
In the DAV implementations of svn_ra_replay, make sure to pass the
checksum argument to close_file through instead of ignoring.  (Note
that this is basically untested, because the svn_repos_replay2 editor
driver doesn't actually calculate checksums; I would like to fix that,
and this is consistent with ra_svn and ra_local at least.)
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/reports/replay.c
(close_file): If a text_checksum argument is passed, add
it as an attribute in the report.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_dav/replay.c
(start_element): In a <close-file/>, pass a checksum attribute
through to the editor if present.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/replay.c
(start_replay): In a <close-file/>, pass a checksum attribute
through to the editor if present.
In svn_repos_replay (and by extension, in svn_ra_replay), send
checksums with close_file.
(Note: to see that this is actually being tested, tweak the close_file
calls to pass some garbage string instead of the right checksum, and
observe that svnsync tests fail.  You'll need to run under something
other than ra_local to observe the one in add_subdir.)
* subversion/libsvn_repos/replay.c
(add_subdir, path_driver_cb_func): Calculate MD5 checksum of the
given file and pass it to editor->close_file.
In svn_repos_replay (and by extension, in svn_ra_replay), send
checksums with apply_textdelta.
(Note 1: to see that this is actually being tested, tweak the
apply_textdelta call to pass some garbage string instead of the right
checksum, and observe that svnsync tests fail.)
(Note 2: we don't pass in the empty file's checksum for
apply_textdelta on new files, because that doesn't seem to be common
in Subversion.)
* subversion/libsvn_repos/replay.c
(path_driver_cb_func): Calculate MD5 checksum of the
delta souce, and pass it to editor->apply_textdelta.
Additionally:
* STATUS
(Approved changes): Remove the r22346 block.

author: cmpilato
msg: Vote for, approving, the r22346 block.

author: cmpilato
msg: Merged revisions 22501 via svnmerge from

Fix issue #2669, correcting paths and configure option in the Solaris
packaging script.
* packages/solaris/buildpkg.sh
Add missing '=' between --with-apxs option and its value.  Account
for move of Solaris packaging from build/pkg/ to packages/solaris/
Patch by: Graham Leggett
Additionally:
